text:
It's nice, but outdated and abandoned.
If you want something more powerful, try SuperDev Pro.
Great work by developer. Much needed App
great tool but how can I make the fontsize of popup box a little bigger?
Pretty helpful, to copy you need to click F to freeze the screen then copy it.
It'a all great, but the modal is to close to an inspected object, so sometimes you can see well
gooood
The fonts for the css values are (yellow color) on my (white background page), this makes it imposible to see the details.
I use this all the time when creating websites. Extremely useful. Thank you so much. God Bless. :)
Very useful CSS viewing tool with the ability to copy the structured CSS. Very interactive and easy to use.
how do i make the pop up box stay still so i can copy one of the items?

Awesome extension!  It really saves me from having to "inspect" objects.  Everyone in my office now has it installed.  If you really need something to do, let us modify the page CSS from your CSS popup :)  Helps test CSS changes in-place.
Best free alternatie for Hover  and CSS Inspector. Great Job
It won't work if the web elements are inside the frame ?

This is my first time I logged in to leave a review. Thank you for making this program. 
It is very useful and helpful when I'm studying. <3

Great tool....

Would be great if there were a way to invoke it with a keyboard shortcut
Very understandable, code is well written!
Excellent!
Great Extension. Useful for front end developers.
Awesome app! Great for use as a quick and easy resource. I recommend giving it a try.
Does exactly what you expect it to.
The Bomb!
I like it
best extension...option to copy element and sub element name to clipboard should be given
good
it is good for webdesigners
Really cool

Good for a quick snapshot of an element, but could be great with these features :
- show inheritance and override (I'm looking at you !important)
- on element click, freeze infos popup and limit its height (on a small screen and with a lot of css properties, we can't read whats below our screen ;) ).

Fantastic. It has a few bugs in display when the page changes however it was the first tool taht i was able to see what class was on a div within a panel that disappeared whenever it lost focus (IE when I opened dev tools, it was removed from the dom)
not bad
Whether the future will increase the replication?
Its works good though it dosen't display most of the properties unless you reload the page and it works only on  http and https pages, the others it dosen't support.
Work fine, but when CSS Styles has a lot of properties don't display completly, I tryed right clic and option of extension but just display the uncomplete css.
Excellent and most useful tool!
like
good
ok

Ain't working. Was looking good, but ...
After reinstall was working nice. But still need a few updates!
This was really Good tool. Today it has stopped completely :( Hope the developer update the app soon.
I like how the properties are organized, but it's a little bit frustrating that sometimes the pop-up is bigger than the screen and you can't see all the properties.
Good CSS Plugin
Great Extension, but some case it position is not correct... getting hidden by the browser menu
Really helpful
I cann't see the text clearly. also it is not showing css format

Appriciate... Nice addon but not working on popups..
I thought it is hidden behind the popup please fix thanks in advance
rally great tool awesome !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
so helpful :)

Nice addon.. Really helpful for me.
Great work developers (Y)
Good extebsions the most of the time, but if you want to check something on the top of the screen : it is impossible because the info is displayed under the window (needs to be in modal !)
hi
Amazing!
Nice application, but it would be nice if you could copy the CSS!

Nice try (this IS essentially a ~3 year old app), but DevTools does the same thing, and that without obscuring the outlines of the very things it's outlining. One irritating thing: this popout just follows your cursor around the page, there's no way to freeze it so you can go do something based on the info from where you froze it. I'd think this should be an obvious feature; a given.

It's nice but I can't see on which line the css code is.

If the css line would be shown too this would be a very nice app!!

an app the be loved :D

so please add this feature! :)

Very useful extension.
Cheers
So Good,quite useful
Works great - but without ability to copy it is not very helpful.
Highly Recommended for noob designer like me! 5 Stars! Thank you!
Simple, but brilliant!
I LOVE THIS ADD-ONS!
Great!
Great! I've found it very useful, but it'd be neat if you could make the box surrounding the info change size depending on how much info there is to display/ Otherwise, very solid app!
Thank you so much for porting this over!
I can see the web css,But I don't know how can i save it.

I love this extension and wish I could continue to use it, but I really have an issue with what I read in the details section:

This extension can access:
Your data on all websites

This item can read every page that you visit -- your bank, your web email, your Facebook page, and so on. Often, this kind of item needs to see all pages so that it can perform a limited task such as looking for RSS feeds that you might want to subscribe to.

Caution: Besides seeing all your pages, this item could... Show more
